snippet: "I am fully committed to moving the smart card program forward,"  Joseph J. Lhota, the transportation authority's new chairman, said.
abstract: "I am fully committed to moving the smart card program forward,"  Joseph J. Lhota, the transportation authority's new chairman, said.

headline.main: Upon Reflection, New M.T.A. Chief Says He Likes 'Smart Cards' for the Subway
headline.print_headline: Upon Reflection, New M.T.A. Chief Says He Likes ‘Smart Card’ for Subway
